name: Poi: Explorer Edition
summary:
"Embark on a classic 3D platforming adventure as you set sail on an airship to collect Explorer Medallions and unravel the mysteries of the Milky Way Globe. Explore uncharted lands, and meet wild new characters, while on a journey to collect all the medallions and become a true Master Explorer! 
 
Explorer Edition Exclusives: 
- Extended Storyline 
- More challenging boss battles 
- Unlockable Soundtrack and Digital Art Book 
- New costumes and hats only available within the “Explorer Edition” 
- Joy-Con motion control support"

esrb.synopsis: This is an adventure platformer in which players assume the roles of orphans on a quest to collect medallions to become master explorers. From a third-person perspective, players run and jump through 3D environments, collect coins, interact with characters, and occasionally harm enemies (e.g., slimes, gophers, bees) by hopping on their heads. Injured characters generally disappear amid puffs of smoke. In one protracted boss battle, players fire a canon at crystals growing from a large stone creature; the frenetic sequence is highlighted by realistic explosions and camera-shaking effects.
